divs: sighting detailswe were outside filming in case we saw a ufo\ifo. time was 8:53 p.m. first thought it was a star. then it started to grow in intensity with multi-color flashes. it then zips up to the right and back again stops flashing and drifts off toward the ocean. i have seen a lot of aircraft and this wasnt one that we are told about.
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
trends: There have been no other sightings in Hubert
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Flashing at first Then Round Super Bright Sphere Glides across sky at fast speed
